mapper.sql:
FROM post_odition a WHERE 1=1
AND type LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{shValue},'%') AND name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND gender LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND member_seq LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.seq ,a.member_seq ,a.type ,a.name ,a.age ,a.gender ,a.casting ,a.producer ,a.director ,a.location ,a.deadline ,a.manager ,a.pay ,a.email ,a.contents
ORDER BY a.seq DESC
SELECT seq FROM post_odition ORDER BY seq DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM post_odition WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq}

SELECT a.member_seq ,a.contents ,a.datetime ,b.path ,b.uuidName ,c.name AS writer FROM post_odition_coment a JOIN memberUploaded b ON a.member_seq = b.pseq JOIN member c ON a.member_seq = c.seq WHERE 1=1 AND b.defaultNy = 1 AND b.type = 2 AND a.member_seq = b.pseq AND a.post_odition_seq = #{seq} ORDER BY a.seq DESC
SELECT a.name AS writer ,b.path ,b.uuidName FROM member a JOIN memberUploaded b ON a.seq = b.pseq WHERE 1=1 AND type = 2 AND defaultNy = 1 AND a.seq = #{member_seq}
